changeSet.author: MoritzSpengler
changeSet.comment: Migrate dueDate from progress_json to due_date column.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE quiz_question_progress SET "due_date" = CASE WHEN progress_json->>'dueDate' IS NOT NULL THEN (progress_json->>'dueDate')::TIMESTAMP ELSE NOW() END;

UPDATE quiz_question_progress SET due_date = CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(progress_json, '$.dueDate') IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(FROM_UNIXTIME(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(progress_json, '$.dueDate'))), DATETIME) ELSE NOW() END;
